Gold.en: An attack that may cause a burn.

Silver.en: An attack that may cause a burn.

Crystal.en: An attack that may cause a burn.

Ruby.en: A fiery charge attack that may inflict a burn.

FireRed.en: The user makes a fiery charge at the foe. It may cause a burn.
FireRed.de: Feuer-Attacke, die den Gegner evtl. verbrennt.
